item.title: Sudal Industries Falls 15.80%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Sharp Decline
item.description: Sudal Industries Ltd endured a challenging week from 19 to 23 January 2026, with its stock price tumbling 15.80% from Rs.65.32 to Rs.55.00, significantly underperforming the Sensex’s 3.31% decline over the same period.
